ORDER

The learned counsel for the _ petitioner seeks
permission to withdraw the Crl.M.C. without prejudice to the right
of the petitioner to file a fresh Crl.M.C., if so advised, challenging
the final report in the case.

Having regard to the facts and circumstances of the
case, I deem it appropriate to grant the permission sought for by
the petitioner. Ordered accordingly.

Sd/-
P.B.SURESH KUMAR
